clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indium In 111 Chloride is indicated for radio labeling of monoclonal antibodies in preparations used for in vivo diagnostic imaging procedures Indiclor is also indicated for radiolabeling Zevalin in preparations used for radio immunotherapy procedure

contraindications.disease: Indium In 111 Chloride is a radioactive tracer for labeling monoclonal antibodies in certain preparations such as OncoScint ProstaScint and Zevalin Its toxicity is related to the final product and not specific to Indium In 111 Chloride alone
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Indium In 111 Chloride is a radioactive tracer for labeling monoclonal antibodies in certain preparations such as OncoScint ProstaScint and Zevalin Its pharmacodynamics is related to the final product and not specific to Indium In 111 Chloride alone
